column2: "Na Tisbinyi Elija a ofi Gilead amamforafo mu no
column5: Israel Nyankopɔn a migyina n’enyim tse ase yi
column6: ɔbɔsu anaaso nsu ronntɔ mfe yi mu

column2: "Na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa ne nkyɛn dɛ
column6: na fa woho kosuma ɔwora Kerit a ɔwɔ Jordan enyim no ho."

column3: ebɔnom ɔwora no mu nsu bi: na mahyɛ nkonkoran dɛ wɔnnyɛn wo wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Nna osii mu kɔree kɛyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm tse: osiandɛ osii mu kɔree kɛtsenaa ɔwora Kerit a ɔwɔ Jordan enyim no ho."
"Na nkonkoran no brɛɛ no boodoo na nam anapa
column3: na boodoo na nam ewimbir; na ɔnoom ɔwora no mu nsu bi."

column4: osiandɛ nna nsu nntɔ asaase no do."

column6: kɔ Zarefat a ɔyɛ Zidon dze no
column8: mahyɛ ɔbaa kunafo bi wɔ hɔ dɛ ɔmbɔ wo akɔhoma."

column2: "Nna ɔsoɛree sii mu kɔr Zarefat; na odur kurow no mu kuropon ano no
column4: ɔbaa kunafo bi wɔ hɔ retaatar mbabaaba: na ɔfrɛɛ no see dɛ
column6: kɛsaw nsu kakra gu kɔɔpow mu brɛ me ma monnom."
fa boodoo trɔma bi kitsa wo nsamu brɛ me."

column3: Dɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn tse ase yi
column5: gyedɛ isiam nsapuw bi a ɔwɔ barba mu
column6: na ngo kakra a ɔwɔ pɔr mu; na
column9: ma maakɔ mekesiesie ama emi na me ba

column3: Mma nnsuro; kɔ kɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ase no: mbom dzi kan yɛ bi tatar kakra ma me
column5: na n’ekyir no ayɛ ɔwo na wo ba dze."

column6: nkyii so ngo pɔr no rennsa
column7: dze ekodu da a EWURADZE bɛma nsu atɔ egu asaase do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no sii mu kɔree kɛyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Elija n’asɛm no tse: na ɔnye Elija
column3: na ɔnoara na ne fie dzii no nda pii."
nkyii so ngo pɔr no annsa
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔnam Elija do kae no tse no ara."
ɔbaa ofiwura no ne babanyin yaree; na ne yarba no mu yɛɛ dzen dodoodow
column5: ma ahom biara annka no mu."

column4: ebɛnadze na menye wo wɔ yɛ? Ɔwo aba me nkyɛn dɛ edze mo bɔn reba nkaa mu

column3: Fa wo ba no ma me. Na oyii no fii no bo mu
column4: na ɔmaa no do kɔr pia mu
column6: na ɔdze no kɔtoo nankasa ne mpa do."

column2: "Na ɔtseaa mu frɛɛ EWURADZE see dɛ
column5: ana edze mbusu aba okunafo yi so a mabɔsoɛ ne nkyɛn yi do

column2: "Na ɔtseen no mu butuuw abofra no do mpɛn ebiasa
column3: na ɔtseaa mu frɛɛ EWURADZE see dɛ
column7: ma abofra yi ne kra mbra no mu bio."

column2: "Na EWURADZE tsiee Elija ne ndze: na abofra no ne kra baa no mu bio
"Na Elija faa abofra no na ɔdze no fi pia no mu sianee baa ɔdan no mu
column3: na ɔdze no maa ne na: na Elija see dɛ
Afei na mehu dɛ Nyame nyimpa nye wo
column4: na EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔwɔ w’anomu yɛ nokwar."
